TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXpsFixedPageWriter implements class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IStoryFragmentProvider

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: Adds a new to the current page.
Docs.returns: The new font resource that was added.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> 添加新<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont>到文档包并将其关联与当前<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A>方法，将字体资源添加到页。
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont AddFont(bool obfuscate) cil managed
Public Function AddFont (obfuscate As Boolean) As XpsFont

Docs.summary: Adds a new obfuscated to the current page.
Docs.returns: The new font resource that was added.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> 添加新<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont>具有到文档包中的可选模糊处理并将其关联与当前<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>。
设置`obfuscate`参数`true`您何时进行模糊处理许可的专有字体法律义务。 而模糊处理对字体不加密，但它会抑制解压缩专有字体和用于其他用途单独安装。
有关字体模糊处理的详细信息，请参阅部分 2.1.7.3"嵌入字体模糊处理"中*XML 纸张规范 (XPS)* 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A>方法，以向页面添加字体资源。
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpageresources)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPageResources](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpageresources)]

abstract member AddFont : bool * bool -> System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont

Docs.param: to prevent modification of any text that uses the font; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Adds a new obfuscated or restricted to the current page.
Docs.returns: The new font resource that was added.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> 添加新<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont>有可选模糊处理或限制到文档包中，并将其关联与当前<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>。
设置`obfuscate`参数`true`您何时进行模糊处理许可的专有字体法律义务。 而模糊处理对字体不加密，但它会抑制解压缩专有字体和用于其他用途单独安装。
有关字体模糊处理和受限制的字体使用的详细信息请参阅*XML 纸张规范 (XPS)* 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A>方法，将字体资源添加到页。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> 添加新<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage>具有指定<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType>到文档包并将其关联与当前<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>。
例如，`imageType`可以是<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType>或<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>。 若要添加的 JPEG 或 PNG<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage>分别。

如果`resourceUri`是`null`，唯一的资源<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Uri%2A>自动创建。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail AddThumbnail(valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType imageType) cil managed
Public Function AddThumbnail (imageType As XpsImageType) As XpsThumbnail

Docs.param: The image type of the thumbnail image to add to the page.
Docs.summary: Adds a thumbnail image of a specified to the current page.
Docs.returns: The new thumbnail image resource that was added.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail%2A> 添加新<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType>到文档包并将其关联与当前<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>。
例如，`imageType`可以是<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType>或<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>。 以分别添加 JPEG 或 PNG 缩略图，。

Docs.exception: has already been called to add an image thumbnail for this page.

block.para: 每个页面只能包含一个缩略图。如果引发调用以添加多个页的缩略图。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Commit() cil managed

Docs.summary: Flushes and closes the fixed-page writer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 根据设置<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>，如<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies>和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>的刷新操作<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Commit%2A>方法可能推迟到完整<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>已关闭。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以刷新并关闭固定页编写器向<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Commit%2A>方法。
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddDocContent](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateadddoccontent)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddDocContent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateadddoccontent)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddDocContent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateadddoccontent)]

Docs.value: 标识的字符串列表该页中包含的超链接点。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 列表<xref:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget>已写入页后可用超链接点和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Commit%2A>调用方法。
璝惠<xref:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget>元素，请参阅部分 3.2.3"\<LinkTarget > 元素"中*XML 纸张规范 (XPS)* 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。
